which must be supplied in order 
to connect Raineys animalcule 
with the vesicalar six hooked 
embryo proceeding from the 
so termed ova of the Tape 
worm. I have no reason 
why this link may not some 
day be supplied, but in the
meantime I think that 
Mr Raineys observations 
should be given to the 
world, as containing 
both novel & important facts, 
<s>and as <\s> further enquiry into 
which
